DOC.brief_summary: Does clinical hypnosis or neuro-linguistic programming improve the success rate of external cephalic version?
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Hypnosis Before External Cephalic Version (ECV)
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective off-center randomisation of clinical hypnosis or neuro-linguistic programming intervention prior to a external cephalic version treatment.
DOC.criteria: singleton breech presentation gestation age above 36 weeks + 6 days multiples cannot understand German language
